page.title: 15ST. BEDES SCHOOL
page.content: St. Bedes was built in 1962. It is a {Roman Catholic Comprehensive Secondary School. There are around eight hundred and fifty pupils attending it. There are forty three full-time teachers and about eleven others. St. Bedes School {uniform}for girls in years one to four is bottle green skirt, jumper/cardigan and white blouse. In the winter they are allowed to wear black trousers. The boys uniform is black or grey trousers, blue, grey or white shirt, red tie and bottle green jumper. There are many different {subjects}and{sports}which we do. There is a varied range of subjects eg. History, French, R.E., Biology, Maths, English, Science, Design, Music and Geography. The school is divided into four{houses:}Keegan, Elgar, Chardin, and John, and the pupils come by coach from as far away as Weston. St.B
